title: Heavy Equals Sign
description: An equals sign in the style of the already existing set of mathematical symbols ‚úñÔ∏è Multiply, ‚ûï Plus, ‚ûñ Minus, and ‚ûó Divide.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the heavy equals sign emoji presents as a bold, thick stroke of deep black, emphasizing balance and agreement with striking visual clarity. Its substantial weight and clean, sharp edges are characteristic of Apple's commitment to precise and impactful design. This emoji is frequently used on Apple devices to signify a perfect match, equivalence, or a definitive conclusion, leaving no room for ambiguity.
